mapper.insert: insert freelisten(title, imgurl, fdesc, status, category, qid, branchid, pubtime, deletekey) values(#{title}, #{imgurl}, #{fdesc}, #{status}, #{category}, #{qid}, #{branchid}, NOW(), #{deletekey})
mapper.update: update freelisten set deletekey=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from freelisten where qid = #{qid} and deletekey=0
select imgurl from freelisten where id=#{id} and deletekey=0
